formulas.name: frmFormattedSpousePhone
formulas.expression: IF( BEGINS(SUBSTITUTE({!txtSpousePhoneNumber.value}, " ", ""), '+45'), SUBSTITUTE({!txtSpousePhoneNumber.value}, " ", ""), IF( BEGINS(SUBSTITUTE({!txtSpousePhoneNumber.value}, " ", ""), '45'), '+' + SUBSTITUTE({!txtSpousePhoneNumber.value}, " ", ""), IF( AND( NOT(BEGINS(SUBSTITUTE({!txtSpousePhoneNumber.value}, " ", ""), '+45')), OR( ISPICKVAL({!Get_Journal.Market_Unit__c}, 'DFJ_DK'), ISPICKVAL({!Get_Journal.Market_Unit__c}, 'Testamente_DK') ) ), '+45' + SUBSTITUTE({!txtSpousePhoneNumber.value}, " ", ""), IF( AND( NOT(BEGINS(SUBSTITUTE({!txtSpousePhoneNumber.value}, " ", ""), '+')), OR( ISPICKVAL({!Get_Journal.Market_Unit__c}, 'DFJ_DK'), ISPICKVAL({!Get_Journal.Market_Unit__c}, 'Testamente_DK') ) ), '+' + SUBSTITUTE({!txtSpousePhoneNumber.value}, " ", ""), IF( BEGINS(SUBSTITUTE({!txtSpousePhoneNumber.value}, " ", ""), '+46'), SUBSTITUTE({!txtSpousePhoneNumber.value}, " ", ""), IF( BEGINS(SUBSTITUTE({!txtSpousePhoneNumber.value}, " ", ""), '46'), '+' + SUBSTITUTE({!txtSpousePhoneNumber.value}, " ", ""), IF( AND( NOT(BEGINS(SUBSTITUTE({!txtSpousePhoneNumber.value}, " ", ""), '+46')), ISPICKVAL({!Get_Journal.Market_Unit__c}, 'FA_SE') ), '+46' + SUBSTITUTE({!txtSpousePhoneNumber.value}, " ", ""), IF( AND( NOT(BEGINS(SUBSTITUTE({!txtSpousePhoneNumber.value}, " ", ""), '+')), ISPICKVAL({!Get_Journal.Market_Unit__c}, 'FA_SE') ), '+' + SUBSTITUTE({!txtSpousePhoneNumber.value}, " ", ""), /* --- Ireland block starts --- */ IF( BEGINS(SUBSTITUTE({!txtSpousePhoneNumber.value}, " ", ""), '+353'), SUBSTITUTE({!txtSpousePhoneNumber.value}, " ", ""), IF( BEGINS(SUBSTITUTE({!txtSpousePhoneNumber.value}, " ", ""), '353'), '+' + SUBSTITUTE({!txtSpousePhoneNumber.value}, " ", ""), IF( AND( NOT(BEGINS(SUBSTITUTE({!txtSpousePhoneNumber.value}, " ", ""), '+353')), ISPICKVAL({!Get_Journal.Market_Unit__c}, 'Ireland') ), '+353' + SUBSTITUTE({!txtSpousePhoneNumber.value}, " ", ""), IF( AND( NOT(BEGINS(SUBSTITUTE({!txtSpousePhoneNumber.value}, " ", ""), '+')), ISPICKVAL({!Get_Journal.Market_Unit__c}, 'Ireland') ), '+' + SUBSTITUTE({!txtSpousePhoneNumber.value}, " ", ""), SUBSTITUTE({!txtSpousePhoneNumber.value}, " ", "") ) ) ) ) /* --- Ireland block ends --- */ ) ) ) ) ) ) ) )

Flow.label: SF - Send Documents for Approval

fields.name: displayError
fields.fieldText:
Something went wrong...


Error message:

{!CustomError}

fields.name: displayHeaderSendDocuments
fields.fieldText: Send Documents to Customer

fields.name: displayEmailAddressUpdateAlert
fields.fieldText: OBS: Updating this field, will update the default Email on the Account

fields.name: displayOtpCodeReceiverInfo
fields.fieldText:
OBS: Updating this field, will update the default Email on the Account.

SMS Verification Codes will be sent to this number.

fields.name: displayOlderVersionsInfo
fields.fieldText: Older Versions of documents will not be visible to the customer and are only displayed here for your reference.

fields.name: displayHeaderDocumentTypeMissing
fields.fieldText:
Document Type is Missing


The following documents do not have Document Type set.

Please update them, before sending.

fields.name: displayHeaderNoDocumentsFound
fields.fieldText: There are no Documents where "Is Newest Version" is checked related to this Journal

fields.name: displaySuccessHeader
fields.fieldText:
Documents Successfully Sent


A link to access the documents has been sent to {!txtEmail.value}.

fields.name: displaySpouseEmailInfoSuccess
fields.fieldText:
Additionally, you've added a Spouse as recipient:


Name: {!txtSpouseFirstName} {!txtSpouseLastName}

Phone: {!frmFormattedSpousePhone}

Email: {!txtSpouseEmail.value}

fields.name: displayCcRecipients
fields.fieldText:
Additionally the following emails has been added as CC Recipients


{!CcRecipientString}

textTemplates.name: rtEmailBody
textTemplates.text:
DENNE EMAIL KAN IKKE BESVARES


Kre {!Get_Journal.Account__r.FirstName} {!Get_Journal.Account__r.LastName},


Dine dokumenter er klar til gennemgang.

Du kan finde dem ved at flge dette link.


Hvis linket ikke er tilgngeligt, indst dette link i din browser direkte

{!DocumentUrl}


Nr du kommer til siden, vil du blive bedt om at verificere dig, ved hjlp af en engangskode.

Denne modtager du p SMS, nr du klikker p knappen "Send Code".


Indtast koden og gennemg dine dokumenter.


Sfremt du har sprgsml, kan du kontakte juristen, vha. chatten nederst i hjre hjrne.


Bemrk at chatten ikke monitoreres konstant og at du kan forvente en svartid p 2-3 hverdage.


Med venlig hilsen,

Din Familiejurist
